topics.body:
Sup guys! After months of inactivity, I have returned to this world once more!

For those who didn't know, I made a vow months ago in this same thread saying that I would leave the fandom so I could focus on my exams for college. The trials are over, so I have a week of freedom. It feels great to be here again.

So, here's a list of interesting things that happened to me during that time period:

I saw mosquitoes have sex.
I got myself a new phone (Samsung Galaxy Note 3) with leather cover and bronze outlines.
I watched Accel World.
I became a substitute young teacher.
I mastered Math.
I became a mascot by dressing up as a green knight.
I bought a laptop with my own money.
I made sushi.
I went to England for two weeks.
I caught a squid.

There are others but I can't seem to remember it now.

In short, I guess reality wasn't so boring as I though.

(PS. What did I miss?)
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
A Jehova's Witness knocks on the front door of a house, ready to spread the word of God.

A small child opens the door wearing a sombrero, his under pants and nothing else. In one had he holds a martini, and he is smoking a big fat cigar.

The Jehova's Witness, outraged says "are your parents home?!"

The small child quite calmy knocks the ash off the end of his stogey, takes a puff and blows the smoke in the JW's face?

"It fucking look like they're home?"
